languages.text: "Он жаждал духовного подвига, и, получив возможность послужить голосом святого, отдал те немногие силы, что были в нем. Перед смертью он был истощен, но спокоен".
"He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."
languages.original_text: "Он жаждал духовного подвига, и, получив возможность послужить голосом святого, отдал те немногие силы, что были в нем. Перед смертью он был истощен, но спокоен".

traits.locale_text: "He yearned for a spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained in him for it. When he died, he was exhausted but content."

"He yearned for a spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained in him for it. When he died, he was exhausted but content."
"He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."
"He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."
"He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."
"He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

languages.text: «Ansiaba una verdadera gesta espiritual y, cuando se le ofreció la ocasión de servir de voz para un santo, entregó cuantas fuerzas le quedaban. Murió exhausto pero feliz».
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

traits.locale_text: «Ansiaba una verdadera gesta espiritual y, cuando se le ofreció la ocasión de servir de voz para un santo, entregó cuantas fuerzas le quedaban. Murió exhausto pero feliz».

languages.text: « Il avait toujours aspiré à accomplir quelque exploit d'ordre spirituel ; ainsi, quand l'occasion de se faire la voix d'un saint s'est présentée à lui, il y a consacré le peu de force qu'il avait encore en lui. Il est mort épuisé, mais comblé. »
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

traits.locale_text: « Il avait toujours aspiré à accomplir quelque exploit d'ordre spirituel ; ainsi, quand l'occasion de se faire la voix d'un saint s’est présentée à lui, il y a consacré le peu de force qu'il avait encore en lui. Il est mort épuisé, mais comblé. »

languages.text: “他渴望实现富有价值的精神壮举。当他意识到自己有机会代圣人发声，他便不顾一切地献出了自己的余生。这称得上是求仁得仁，死得其所。”
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

traits.locale_text: “他渴望实现富有价值的精神壮举。当他意识到自己有机会代圣人发声，他便不顾一切地献出了自己的余生。这称得上是求仁得仁，死得其所。”

languages.text: 「彼は霊的な偉業に憧れ、聖人の声として奉仕する機会を与えられたとき、わずかに残った力を捧げたのです。死にいたるとき、彼は疲れ果てていたが、満足していました」
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は霊的な偉業に憧れ、聖人の声として奉仕する機会を与えられたとき、わずかに残った力を捧げたのです。死にいたるとき、彼は疲れ果てていたが、満足していました」

languages.text: "Er sehnte sich danach, eine würdige spirituelle Großtat zu vollbringen, und als sich ihm die Gelegenheit bot, als Stimme eines Heiligen zu dienen, gab er den kläglichen Rest seiner Kraft. Er starb erschöpft, aber zufrieden."
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."

traits.locale_text: "Er sehnte sich danach, eine würdige spirituelle Großtat zu vollbringen, und als sich ihm die Gelegenheit bot, als Stimme eines Heiligen zu dienen, gab er den kläglichen Rest seiner Kraft. Er starb erschöpft, aber zufrieden."

languages.text: "Saygı duyulacak ruhani bir beceri arzulamıştı ve bir azizin sözcüsü olarak hizmet etme şansı sunulduğunda kalan son gücünü de buna harcadı. Vefat ettiğinde bitkin bir hâlde olsa da memnundu."
languages.original_text: "He yearned for a worthy spiritual feat, and, when presented with the chance to serve as the voice of a saint, he gave what little strength remained. When he died, he was exhausted, but content."
